question: I had a concern about the following product whether this could be HALAL for male hair/beard.
answer:
QUESTION

Assalamu Alaikum
Thanks a lot for your kind reply. I had a concern about the following product whether this could be HALAL for male hair/beard.
Brand Name: Nurani Brown Henna (for hair)
On the label it says (R) & (C)
In other words, is any blown mehendi / color is permitted for men to be used in beard?
If any blown color is used in beard, would that make Salat unacceptable?
Was Salam.

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

It is permissible to dye ones hair/beard with brown mehendi, however one should avoid using black dye/mehendi as its usage is prohibited.
The usage of brown mehendi will not have any effect on one’s salaah.

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

 

Ml. Ebrahim Desai,
Student Dārul Iftā
